FFT Spectral Granulator

Thu, Oct 14, 21 Length: 1 min
Category: Audio Tags: PureData Oscillators

My main goal with this patch was to experiment with IFFT synthesis in context of a sample based granular synthesizers. It uses Miller Puckette’s phase vocoder example in conjunction with Scott “Acriel” Nordlund’s example of frequency domain filtering.

Click here to Download
